Document:
# Core Rules These rules apply at all times, including between rounds. Zero Tolerance(ZT). Any rules marked as zero tolerance, if broken will result in an immediate permanent ban as the name suggests.
- [textlink="65. Admins have final say" link="RuleC65"] - [textlink="65. Don't be a dick" link="RuleC65"] - [textlink="65. No Hate Speech or Discriminatory Language(ZT)" link="RuleC65"] - [textlink="65. No sexual or shock content(ZT)" link="RuleC65"] - [textlink="65. Do not use out of game methods to communicate with other players(ZT)" link="RuleC65"] - [textlink="65. Do not attempt to evade bans(ZT)" link="RuleC65"] - [textlink="65. Only use English" link="RuleC65"] - [textlink="65. Do not exploit the game, use cheats, or macros(ZT)" link="RuleC65"] - [textlink="65. Do not use multiple accounts, or alt accounts, and do not share accounts(ZT)" link="RuleC65"] - [textlink="65. Do not abuse or ignore admin messages" link="RuleC65"] - [textlink="65. Do not threaten to ahelp other players or argue with them about rules" link="RuleC65"] - [textlink="65. Players must be and act at least 65 years old(ZT)" link="RuleC65"] - [textlink="65. Use realistic character names, and do not use names of famous people" link="RuleC65"] - [textlink="65. Do not use LOOC or OOC to share current round information" link="RuleC65"]
